GSP29antsdi_u:26208: pramāṇaṃ tajjanyā pramā tadvṛtti pramātvaṃ taninaṣṭhatvaṃ paratogrāhyatve '
GSP29antsdi_u:26209: tathā ca yannirūpaṇānantaraṃ yannirūpyate tayoreva saṃgatirūpaḥ saṃbandhaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:26211: pramāṇanirūpitā saṃgatiḥ paratogrāhyatve vaktavyā/ sā ca
GSP29antsdi_u:26218: pramāṇam, tajjanyā pramā tadvṛtti pramātvaṃ tanniṣṭhatvaṃ paratogrāhyatve/
GSP29antsdi_u:26225: svaśabdo 'tra svīyavācī san jñānagrāhakasāmagrīpara iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:26248: evaṃ ca uktarītyā vyavasthāpane ca/ nanu
GSP29antsdi_u:26261: pramitikaraṇatvāt ata āha - vastutastviti iti vyākhyānam -
GSP29antsdi_u:26282: iti strīliṅganirdeśa eva kārya ityata āha - [274] sāmānya iti/
GSP29antsdi_u:26311: ghaṭa iti jñānagrāhakasāmagryāṃ nāstīti sā sāmagrī
GSP29antsdi_u:26314: atastādṛśabhedavacvasaṃbandhena svaviśiṣṭā yā uktasāmagrī tajjanyo yat
GSP29antsdi_u:26315: jñānaṃ ghaṭajñānaviṣayakaṃ jñānaṃ tanniṣṭho yo bhedaḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:26393: idaṃ jñānamaprameti jñāne prāmāṇyaṃ pratiyogitayā viṣayaḥ tathāpi
GSP29antsdi_u:26399: idamatra cintyam-atra evakāraḥ gṛhyata ityanantaraṃ yojanayā 'gṛhyata
GSP29antsdi_u:26401: tathā cāyaṃ kriyāsaṅgata evakāraḥ nīlaṃ sarojaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:26476: evaṃ ca kālādivāraṇe 'pi ātmādivāraṇamaśakyamata āha - [287] pramātvādhiketyādi/
GSP29antsdi_u:26489: pramātadvṛttitvaṃ jñānatve svaṃ pramātvaṃ tadabhāvādhikaraṇabhramavṛttitvaṃ ca
GSP29antsdi_u:26561: parvato vahnimān na veti saṃśaye vahniḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:26566: sthitiḥ/ etāṃ manasikṛtya anugamasya samanvayo jñeyaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:26574: tannirūpitā yā parvataniṣṭhā viśeṣyatā tatsamānādhikaraṇā yā
GSP29antsdi_u:26578: tannirūpakatvaṃ ca parvato vahnimānna veti saṃśaye 'stīti/ atra
GSP29antsdi_u:26689: nirastā/ saṃskārātmakasya vyāpārasya tadānīṃ naṣṭhatvena taddvārā
GSP29antsdi_u:26748: rūpaṃ viśeṣaguṇaityādau vākyabhedaprasaṅgasya ca nāvakāśa iti/
GSP29antsdi_u:26775: lakṣaṇe ekatvaniveśanaṃ viphalamityata āha - [309] ekapadamiti/ nanu
GSP29antsdi_u:26796: ityatra vyāvṛttiśabdārthaḥ bhedaḥ sādhakaḥ pratyayārtha iti
GSP29antsdi_u:26852: bhūtalaghaṭādīnāṃ dvitvaṃ na tādṛśamiti na bhūtalaghaṭādyoratiprasaṅgaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:26907: kḷpte yatra kutracidantarbhāvamanumuktvā dvitīyata uktasya prameyasya
GSP29antsdi_u:26911: saṅgrahaḥ/ [331] dravya iti antarbhāva ityanena sambandhaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:26972: yadyapi caramaṃ yadduḥkhaṃ taddhvaṃso mokṣa ityanyatra
GSP29antsdi_u:26985: duḥkhaviśiṣṭānyatvādirūpameva caramatvaṃ suvacam/ na ca tasya
GSP29antsdi_u:27085: - yatheti/ tasminneva - śabdo nitya ityādyupadarśitarūpa eva/ 'iti
GSP29antsdi_u:27101: gateti rūpeti ca guṇaviśeṣaṇam/ tathā ca
GSP29antsdi_u:27121: tathā ca yathā ātmā tathā loṣṭa ityasyāpyāgamena/
GSP29antsdi_u:27248: janyatā/ tathā ca - prayatnānuvidhāyitvasyobhayathā sambhave ca/ tasya -
GSP29antsdi_u:27261: iti bhāvaḥ/ idaṃ ca vādyapajatahetutvarūpaṃ nigrahasthānalakṣaṇaṃ ca/
GSP29antsdi_u:27398: sparśo 'tra sarvatra saṃyogarūpaḥ grantha eva spaṣṭaḥ/ rūpeti
GSP29antsdi_u:27584: ayamāśayaḥ--- yatra kṛtyasādhyatvasya kṛtisādhyatvasya ca jñānaṃ nāsīt
GSP29antsdi_u:27688: phalatvam/ janyave sati pravṛtyuddeśyatvaṃ hi tat/
GSP29antsdi_u:27810: ghaṭādirūpakāryasyaiva bhānaṃ kuto na sambhavatītyatrāha - na hīti/ na
GSP29antsdi_u:27828: dvitīyam/ paṇḍatvaṃ napuṃsakatvam phalājanakatvamiti yāvat iti
GSP29antsdi_u:27833: kriyāyā dhātvarthasya yatkāryaṃ phalaṃ tatretyartha iti bhramavyudāsāyāha -
GSP29antsdi_u:27851: kalayati utpādayati phalamiti vyutpattyā niṣpanno 'yaṃ śabdaḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:27867: yāgasyāyogyatāniścayo mā bhūt tatsaṃśayaḥ paraṃ jāyata eveti
GSP29antsdi_u:27903: anyathā prāguktakalpanā -- apūrvarūpadharmasya nāśakalpanā tannāśaṃ prati
GSP29antsdi_u:27927: vidhirathau vācyo yasyeti bahuvrīhiḥ/ tathā ca
GSP29antsdi_u:27942: tat - kiṃ karotītyevaṃ rūpam/ taditi/ kiṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:28031: kañcanākṣepaṃ tatparihāraṃ ca vivakṣan tadupayo gitvena
GSP29antsdi_u:28112: nididhyāsitavyo draṣṭavya iti yojaneti bhāvaḥ/ yuktibhiḥ
